analysis.key_quote: I do NOT favor changing the current merit-based civil service positions, given it is PERFORMANCE based and protects civil servants jobs from political/partisans who wish to move government employees away from good independent performance to someone with allegiance to a person or party.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes changes to the merit-based civil service system, emphasizing the importance of protecting civil servants from political influence, which aligns with concerns about politicization.
